title: Deianira Queen of Laires Rellik
description: A widow who has everything she ever wanted, the perfect business, the perfect friends, the perfect home, almost the perfect life. Yet for her one thing is still missing. A year after being locked in her mansion after the passing of her late husband, Deianira is now ready to return to the real world. Now after establishing herself as one of the most successful women in Laires Rellik, she is now on the quest to resurrect her position as the Queen. But what will happen when she meets someone who could change the entire trajectory of her life? Will Deianira let love effect her position as the Queen of Laires Rellik? This is A Story of Love & Betrayal.This is the 1st edition of the Deianira Trilogy Series.
author: Lorenzo James
